head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TRATTNER, ALBERT E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TRATTNER, ALBERT E.

block.p: TRATTNER-Albert E. Beloved husband of the late Ann, father of Harry A. and Ira, grandfather of Mirek Samuel. Services May 4, 10 AM, Parkside Chapels, Forest Hills. T'hay Nishmato L'vracha.

TRATTNER-Albert. We mourn the passing of Albert Trattner, father of our beloved Cantor, Harry Trattner. Our deepest condolences to Harry, Amira, and their family. The Board of Trustees of the Fire Island Synagogue and Rabbi Shaul Magid
